page.title: 13Industrial Sites
page.content: {INDUSTRIAL SITES} DELMA Pipe Insulation 2 years in business 20 employed TUF'S Shoes 40 years in business 210 employed BEWA Electric Equipment 7years in business 7 employed TECWELD Welding and Machining 10 years in business 30 employed DANIMAC macs 18 years in business 175 employed LLOYDS MENSWEAR makes mens clothes 102 years in business 75 employed BRECON SMALL WORK joinery 2-3 years in business 7 employed HJ foam 6 months in business 30 employed FOLIO covers for sofas and chairs 10 months in business 15 employed WOODVALE CLOTHING CO overalls 2 years in business 36 employed
